block.p: National Hockey League COLORADO AVALANCHE--Traded D Sandis Ozolinsh and a 2000 second-round draft pick to Carolina for D Nolan Pratt, a 2000 first-round and two second-round draft picks. ISLANDERS--Traded G Roberto Luongo and C Olli Jokinen to Florida for F Mark Parrish and F Oleg Kvasha. Traded D Eric Brewer, F Josh Green and a 2000 second-round draft pick to Edmonton for D Roman Hamrlik.

National Hockey League COLORADO AVALANCHE--Traded D Sandis Ozolinsh and a 2000 second-round draft pick to Carolina for D Nolan Pratt, a 2000 first-round and two second-round draft picks. ISLANDERS--Traded G Roberto Luongo and C Olli Jokinen to Florida for F Mark Parrish and F Oleg Kvasha. Traded D Eric Brewer, F Josh Green and a 2000 second-round draft pick to Edmonton for D Roman Hamrlik.

PHOENIX COYOTES--Acquired LW Brad May from Vancouver for future considerations. SAN JOSE SHARKS--Named Rich Preston and Cap Raeder assistant coaches. Signed RW Mikael Samuelsson. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Acquired G Kevin Weekes, the rights to D Kristian Kudroc and a 2001 second-round draft pick from the slanders for a 2000 first-round draft pick and a fourth-round draft pick, and returned a 2000 seventh-round draft pick to the Islanders.
COLLEGE GREENSBORO--Named Jill Goodhind men's and women's cross country coach.
